contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox political party |country = Nigeria |name = United Nigeria People's Party |party_logo = |chairperson = Selah Jambo |secretary_general = Ukeje Nwokeforo |foundation = 1998 |headquarters = Plot 1467, Safana Close, Off Zaria St, Garki 11, [[Abuja]] |ideology = |colours = Green, white, brown |colorcode = green |website = }} The '''United Nigeria People's Party''' is a [[political party]] in [[Nigeria]]. At the 12 April 2003 [[legislative]] [[elections in Nigeria|elections]] the party won 2.8% of popular votes, 2 out of 360 seats in the [[House of Representatives of Nigeria]], and no seats in the Senate. {{Portal|Africa}} {{Nigeria political parties}} [[Category:Political parties in Nigeria]] [[Category:Political parties established in 1998]] {{Nigeria-party-stub}}
